descriptionHTML:
Legendary heroes join an endless idle RPG battle that began over a thousand years ago! Fight legendary monsters, enter online PvP role playing battles and end the reign of the Dark Prince in Endless Frontier!

Travel across endless stages of fantasy RPG action with online PvP games, offline RPG guild wars and plenty of treasures to unlock! Upgrade your character with limitless fantasy RPG power ups and take control of legendary heroes in the Endless Frontier!

After failing to defeat the dreadful Prince of Darkness, Erin vows to revive himself again and again to organize the Knightgage of Dimension! Join the automatic fantasy RPG action!

Endless Frontier Features:

1. Idle RPG Fantasy Games
★ Idle RPG gameplay in an exciting fantasy adventure!
★ Lead your knights into the heat of battle and defeat the dreaded Prince of Darkness in epic autoquests!

2. Legendary Heroes
★ Heroes number over 150 and have their own powers – Which ones will you command?
★ Monster trainer – Recruit more than 50 pets to aid you in your quest!
★ Command more than 100 kinds of army units, to become legends of war!

3. Endless Inflation RPG
★ Grow stronger each time you revive with progressive gameplay!
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Level up and tap your way through an expansive frontier of over 9000 stages!

4. Online PvP Guild Wars and Dungeon Games
★ Online multiplayer awaits with endless PvP battles and 200 vs. 200 guild wars that offer endless fun
★ Dungeon boss battles award you with 20 kinds of unique treasures and rare gifts

5. Find Gifts and Treasures
★ Discover more than 200 relics to aid you in your autoquest
★ Get treasure chests in each stage for even more great rewards!
★Obtain gold automatically the longer you stay in the frontier, the more chances you’ll have to tap and find more treasures


Traverse the frontier, take on your friends and see why Endless Frontier is one of the best idle RPG games on the market, today!


■ Rights Information
We request the following permissions for smooth gameplay.

[ Modify or delete the contents of your SD card (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) ]
Use an external storage such as SD cards to save and load game data.

[ Find accounts on the device (GET_ACCOUNTS) ]
This right is need for the linkage and notification between your game account and google account information.

[ Read cell phone's status and ID (READ_PHONE_STATE) ]
Inquire the device information for the advertising services provided within the customer interaction and game. (Manufacturer, model, OS version, etc.)

[ The approximate location (network-based) (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION) ]
Use the network/wifi information to provide the advertisement in one of the advertising services because items can be obtained free of charge after seeing it.

comments: Sometimes it's fun and most of the time will really piss you off. Like as soon as you log in someone has already got 20 kills. Or you get matched up with people that are at a much higher level. It can be very frustrating,  my guess is that there trying to get you to spend lots of money.

I think this game is awesom.. sometimes I get in a shootout and I'm taken out before I can get a shot, that just makes me want to shoot better.. but most the time I'm battling it out till the till the time play stops, then I get to view everyone's score on both teams and see what rank did what.. Not only is this game  challenging and exciting,  but NO ADS.  5 stars from me
Sometimes opponents do not die even after hitting 10-12 headshots.. quiet unfair check on that.. I would give you 5 stars
Everytime I'm on this game I can't put down the phone. I have to charge my phone or I get disconnected by the Wi-Fi Z

Great way to kill time. Not loaded with ads. Easy to earn upgrades. Really fun game. Was fun then came all the useless changes. Points. Cups. Penalties. It is a punishment to build a squad from the ground up these days

This game asks for access to your contacts with the regular excuse that it only for your username. If it is the truth, I will enter my username, but no way i am gonna give you access to my contacts. If you don't give them this access, the game will exit. Deleted.
description: Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.• Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

comments: It's a good story and all. But I only wish they would let me save up energy or at least give me a little more. It gets frustrating when I can't Carry on, I'm not a patient person. Graphics are good. Controls are good. Story is great! Loving most of this game so far. I just hope they change the energy part of it. Though I guess it's a lot easier to read thn most episode stories.

I love the story Line just like I've been reading in the comments the energy sucks I know it's just to keep us from reading the story so fast an to blow our money on, but if there was another way instead of us waiting for so long for just a little energy it's defently keeping me from downloading another game like this.. it takes so long to receive the 300 energy I done forgot an really not into the story Like I was when I 1st downloaded it.

The story and art art great, like in the other game, and I love the music too.  I have 2 major complaints though: 1. It's not indicated anywhere in the appstore that this is a work in progress (there's currently 4 chapters in English). This particularly bothers me since I bought energy so I could get immersed in the story, only to be torn out of that immersion by an incomplete story. 2. The energy system. I mentioned this in my review for the Drogo one as well, and plenty of people pointed it out here so I won't go into detail.

I think all of these Is it love stories are absolutely amazing. The writing has given me inspiration to read more romance novels. But I don't like the energy system. I foolishly paid a lot of money to read/play longer and I'm glad the author and developers get the money for a product I thoroughly enjoy. I just wish the daily energy was 1000 or something

Amazing story... When will there be more chapters?! I also don't like how I have to buy energy in order to not just have five minutes (maybe) of reading the story and making decisions. Please come out with more chapters soon!

Loving the story so far and the graphics.. It's all so beautiful. Only wish that they would give you more energy over time to read it.. when you lose time to read you lose interest in the story by the waiting. Help us stay interested!
description: Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. descriptionHTML:
Christmas is on the way! New Xmas version is released! Join the snowy Musou World with your Friends!

“Musou Glory” is a MMOARPG mobile game, a perfect blend of classic role-playing and the new open world gameplay, which create a massive storyline, expressed with visually stunning graphic! Brave the world with alliance, or even meet the love of your life in the world of “Musou Glory”!

Game Features:
- Unique Gameplay
The game has revolutionary gameplay with new elements, new system, and new battle modes. It will surely change the way you play ARPG. Enjoy “Musou Glory” with the stunning visual and exhilarating gameplay!

- Epic Dungeon Crawling Gameplay
The game development team has carefully collected the opinions from world renowned game reviewers and thousands of gamers. They have worked hard to craft the dungeon crawling system which specialized in the multiplayer element. The overall game design is an all-rounded one, where hardcore gamers, as well as casual players will find a perfect gaming style that suits them!

- Intriguing PvE and PvP systems
The game consists of numerous PvE and PvP gameplay such as brawl, team battle, clan war, arena, and many more. Be a lone wolf, or a team player while playing the game. Battle freely, anytime, anywhere!

- Lead the trend with fashionable costume
Express yourself with the wide variety of costumes available in the game. There are hundreds of costumes available, ensuring your style to be one of the kind!

Contact Us:
Official Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/MusouGlory/
Homepage: http://mg.eyougame.com/

comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! 👍🏽

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!
description: ** Google Play Best of 2015  **Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE AwardsWinner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo "Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZoneBUILD THE PERFECT VAULTCreate a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.CUSTOMIZETurn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.PROSPERA well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! EXPLORE THE WASTELAND Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!PROTECT YOUR VAULTFrom time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.
descriptionHTML:
** Google Play Best of 2015 **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly!

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.
developerAddress:
Bethesda Softworks LLC
1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050

-Feeling Lucky?  Your dwellers will, with faster Luck training.
-Everyone loves a surprise – so surprise quests will appear more frequently.
Vault-Tec certified optimizations and date adjustments.
summary: Fallout Shelter puts you in control of a state-of-the-art underground Vault.
title: Fallout Shelter

This is by far the greatest game that I've ever played! A lot of my friends play as well, so I  can enjoy playing for a long time. Caution: Very addictive game!!! I find it hard to stop playing once I start. This is one app that you're going to want to download if you want to have some fun.

I use to enjoy playing this game.  Lately though, there are less power ups to achieve and more of the movie tickets.  I would rather have the power ups than the tickets.  This is why I am changing the rating I previously gave of 5 stars to 3.  Also, you should really have more of the Glenda versus the Wicked Witch challenges.

Great game but I really wish that daily rewards are better. It used to be you would get a crystal ball often, money and other things that to help with game, but lately it has been stuoid little rewards like two coins or one row clear. What happened to good rewards for players that come on every day and expect to get a little help in the game play

I love this game except for ONE big aggravation.   When you win extended life you don't get to choose when to use it.  It starts immediately and sometimes you've been playing to complete a sprint or another section and you CANT play another two hours.   That means you lose that extra time.   Today I've lost a 3 hour extra play and now I'm about to lose another 2 hour play.   Very Annoying!
description: Match 3 down THE YELLOW BRICK ROAD™ in a magical puzzle adventure game featuring DOROTHY™, the SCARECROW™, the TIN MAN™ and the COWARDLY LION™! Magic awaits in the EMERALD CITY™! Join the fun by solving puzzles and unlocking magical movie Moments! Learn fun facts and trivia, and see never-before-seen stills from The Wizard of Oz! Discover the rarest Moments to learn more about your favorite movie! Match your way to meet the wonderful Wizard of Oz in this amazing puzzle adventure! The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match Features: MATCH 3 IN THE LAND OF OZ!- Match 3 with new and unique gameplay based on the beloved Wizard of Oz movie and characters!- Matching brings you farther down the Yellow Brick Road with hundreds of exciting levels to overcome on your way!- Match even faster with bonuses and power-ups from GLINDA THE GOOD WITCH™! Use Dorothy’s RUBY SLIPPERS™, Munchkin Lollipops and the Tin Man’s Axe to solve puzzles!- Get help from your favorite movie characters by dropping their Medallions to the bottom of the board. They will appear and provide assistance on your current level! BATTLE AGAINST THE WICKED WITCH!- Match 3 or more gems against the WICKED WITCH OF THE WEST™ as you battle to reach The Wizard of Oz.- The fantasy comes to life as you take on the Wicked Witch in turn-based matching combat. ADVENTURE IN A MAGICAL WORLD!- Visit Munchkinland, the Haunted Forest, and more enchanting locations on your way from Kansas to the Emerald City!- Discover brand new levels and your favorite beloved characters in each new region you unlock.- Adventure with friends from Facebook, sharing gifts as you go. COLLECTIONS - MOVIE FACTS & MOMENTS!- Unlock and collect new Moments for an all-new perspective on classic scenes from the film!- Learn fun facts about your favorite movie! Collect each type of Reel containing Moments to complete Sets for big rewards and to unlock the full magical experience! DAILY REWARDS AND EVENTS!- Redeem Dorothy’s Daily Reward for a new bonus each day!- Win amazing prizes every day and join Happy Hour Events for even more!- Come and take part in weekly events, where you can face off against the Wizard of Oz himself, and other fun characters!   Download The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match and relive the magic of The Land of Oz today! Already enjoying The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match? comments: The good:  Better than WB1 where the same words kept showing up throughout even at difficult levels.  It's also nice that it shows your previous progress in a puzzle after you're forced to clear/restart it.  And although you'll still see lots of words that aren't part of the answer, the puzzles are themed so you can ignore those non-answers.  The bad:  The ads are very loud and you can't always silence them before they play.  It does not remember your sound choice so don't even think about playing this in the library.  Also, the game now has a ridiculous background that obfuscates the answer boxes making the game almost unplayable.  Finally, there are way too many boringly easy puzzles that you have to go through before you get to see the fun ones.  I almost uninstalled before getting there.
Really makes you think this game really makes you think it's mind-boggling

Definitely one of the more scammy feeling games I've tried in a while. Don't accept these trash games, boycot hard and uninstall.
Great game! can get very expensive! But possibly to get everything just by playing a lot! And when I say a lot, I mean - plan on being busy for a couple years. Otherwise, Great Game!

Suffers from the classic issue of fee to play games. Buy your way to victory. Between the gears, springs, cash, gold bars, weapon tokens and car tokens all with three tiers to keep track off it's very confusing.  Heaven help if you've done all the things and are stuck with no way to earn anything.  Could be better by simplifying the buying and upgrading, but now it's just taking up space on my phone.

descriptionHTML:
Guns, cars and zombies! Who wants more?

Smash through zombies in this action-packed post-apocalyptic racing game. Pimp your ride, mount your gun and drive through various dangerous locations full of deadly enemies. Do you have the skills to survive the attack of zombie hordes on the road?

Guns, Cars, Zombies! is the most epic post-apocalyptic racing game where you have to battle zombies for survival.


▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CARS ◀
Choose your style and build your unique zombie survival car!
Muscle cars, hot-rods, sport cars, pickups and other crazy vehicles to choose from.
Every car is fully customizable with dozens of unique parts.

▶ DEADLY WEAPONS ◀
Mount various weapons to the car to be more deadly.
Shoot zombies to survive.

▶ PLAY THE STORY ◀
Play through four campaigns and complete more than a hundred levels.
Each campaign has its own location to drive through, special enemies to kill and unique missions to complete.

▶ FIRE AT WILL ◀
Get out of the driver’s seat, hop in behind the turret and shoot down all of the zombies!

▶ SCAVENGE ◀
Visit abandoned places to find loot

▶ CHALLENGES ◀
Can you survive a road full of zombies and obstacles?
Challenge your driving skills on dozens of special levels.

▶ ONLINE TOURNAMENTS ◀
Compete against other real players and win big prizes in daily tournaments!
Climb up the leaderboard, get promoted to higher league and show the world that you are the best survivor of the apocalypse.


▶ HOW TO PLAY ◀
Hit zombies and avoid obstacles on the road
Shoot zombies for bonuses
Build a zombie-proof car to be unstoppable
Collect resources to purchase, upgrade and customize your vehicles and arsenal

▶ HINTS ◀
PLAY every day for valuable free rewards
Complete QUESTS to get resources
FORGE resources to craft powerful items
Visit the BOUNTY HUNTER for rewards
Buy LOOT BOXES to get tons of resources
KIll a lot of zombies to activate THE BEAST inside you


Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and link the game to your Facebook account to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE, this game is free to play and everything can be unlocked for free with a reasonable amount of effort but it offers items and packages which can be bought using real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

★★★★★ Please rate it to support cool new updates and write an honest feedback to make the game even better!

The game was fun for a little while, but it becomes quite monotonous. The game isn't interactive enough to keep you coming back for more. You more or less just watch your heroes battle which takes a lot of possible fun out of the game right away. If you spend any cash at all on the game, you unlock the ability to "raid" your already completed missions. So then when you need items, you will just mash the raid button until your energy is gone. And the energy recharges VERY slowly. You can play for free, but will progress substantially slower than the pay-to-play player. So overall, it's fun for a short while (a week or two), but you will quickly grow tired of it due to poor interactivity. If you are looking for a game similar to this that will keep your interest and has much more to offer, I would recommend Summoners War.

Game apparently 'malfunctioned' and the heroic chest kept saying open free.  This was after I spent $25 US dollars so of course I thought why wouldn't I get some free opens?  I didn't know they were charging me 200 emeralds a pop.  Customer service was NO help.  Hopefully I can get a refund from Google Play.  Don't download!  Bad programming, scam in game purchases!
While the game seems nice enough, it is nothing like the advertisement I watched. Complete misrepresentation gets one star.

descriptionHTML:
League of War: Mercenaries is an exciting war strategy game where you can make choices that have real impact and outcomes. Immerse yourself in this 3D war game to build your base, grow your army, and battle your way to victory.

3D battlefield mixed with a unique tug of war deck-based combat system, giving you an exciting tactical war strategy game that will keep you playing for days! Build a fighting force of extraordinary magnitude to wage war on corporations and nations. Take on hundreds of missions or compete with fellow Mercenaries to claim victory around the globe and enjoy the spoils of war!

In League of War: Mercenaries, players act as mercenaries, taking on military contractors that play out on the battlefield to claim victory around the globe. Upgrade your army with futuristic tech, battle your enemies, and come out on top in this tactical war.

= LEAGUE OF WAR: MERCENARIES FEATURES =

3D GAME - EXPERIENCE A LUSH 3D BATTLEFIELD
★ Battle your way through stunning 3D content, from your military headquarters to intensely fast-paced combat!
★ 3D war visuals with stunning, visceral combat that plays out in real time

WAR STRATEGY - YOUR CHOICES HAVE AN IMPACT
★ Build and strengthen your army with tanks, helicopters, infantries and more.
★ Strategize the units you use to ensure your victory on the battlefield
★ Advanced warfare tech will help you dominate your enemies and rule the planet
★ Strategy and tactics will make your army the strongest

REAL TIME STRATEGY COMBAT – UPDATE TACTICS IN REAL TIME
★ Tactical wars have enveloped the world. Battle for control in intense RTS combat!
★ RTS games challenge you to strategically configure and prepare your squad in a variety ways to counter sophisticated enemy units
★ Real time strategy combat challenges you to always stay one step ahead of your enemy

BASE BUILDING - EXPAND & UPGRADE MILITARY HEADQUARTERS
★ Build and upgrade the ultimate military HQ with sophisticated base building tools
★ Defend your base by leveling up your military fortress
★ Building games lovers will really enjoy this fast paced, action packed RTS

AMRY UPGRADES – BUILD A BETTER MILITARY
★ Armies are upgradeable so you can always utilize new tactics
★ Tanks, aircraft and more are at your disposal as you clash with enemies

UPGRADE MERCENARIES - CUSTOMIZE MILITARY UNITS
★ Upgrade & equip units with a vast array of technology for specific roles to defeat your enemy!
★ Build your army, from tanks to infantry, and put a personal stamp on your mercenaries
★ Mercenaries grow stronger as you gain new tech and tactics

ALLIANCE BUILDING - FORGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
★ Alliances let you bring your military might down on enemies
★ Online multiplayer - Create an Alliance and band together against enemy for powerful rewards!
★ Play with friends! Join your friends for deeper engagements and battle together

MULTIPLAYER MODE - TEST YOUR STRATEGY IN 2 PLAYER BATTLES
★ Defend your base and battle to be the best!
★ Multiplayer war breaks out across the world. Will you come out on top?
★ PVP combat challenges you to earn valuable loot by defeating fellow players in head-to-head battle!

Defense and offense are critical – which strategy will you use to conquer the world?

Battle to conquer the world with advanced warfare tactics and a powerful army of infantry, tanks and helicopters. Combat multiplayer opponents in PVP strategy games, build the ultimate base and lead your team of mercenaries to global domination.

Download League of War: Mercenaries and become King of the mercenaries!

Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/MunkyFunGames

comments: Red crystal lvls should be targetable by one click...now you must scroll the whole map. Crates/actives should be tradable 2useless for 1 you want...late game you end up with tons of useless ones and 0 of those you use. Magnet should be an upgrade(like boss dmg and shield mitigation)...chasing bloops late game is a nuinsance.

This game was awesome until i loaded it up and noticed that ALL MY PROGRESS WAS GONE!!! I ALMOST HAD AN EPIC DART THROWER!!!!!!! When i tried to get my progress back using Facebook/Google Play. It was gone too. Please fix.

The game is surprising addicting and offers plenty of content! The progression is decent so far and I really liked the idea of the endeless game modes with leaderboards that reward you! My only gripes about it so far are:  - doesn't support 18:9 aspect ratio - the rewards for the endless game modes could use a boost imo - Only offers one control scheme (there's a game called skyforce: reloaded that offers a manual control setting, essentially the player doesn't follow the finger and the whole screen becomes a joystick, this helps with the game's clarity)   Great casual game otherwise, would recommend giving it a shot 🙂
Great Game. Can't see anything wrong with it. Totally recommend not just ninja kiwi fans but everyone! Thoroughly enjoyed it

I must say that this is better than the older one. However, in TD5, players can buy forever constant upgrades, such as the X2 money and the double village boost area. I recommend that augmentation is needed. It likes amulets and rings in RPG games. For example, a pair of boots that increases firing rate.  I hope my recommendation is not too difficult for skillful developers like you guys.

As a fan of Ninja kiwis work with Bloons series and Sas this will be inherintly biased a minor amount. Now that's my disclaimer.  To anyone thinking about purchasing the game I would say go for it as the price is low (When I bought it), the gameplay is fun and lots of customisation, the graphics could be touched a small bit on but that's me being picky also I would suggest them having faster moving speed for the supermonkey and it feels a small bit slow.  The game is fun and my criticism with the graphics and the movement speed of the monkey should be either disregarded or taken with a grain of salt it does not ruin the gameplay in any way, shape or form.
description: Endless legions of colorful bloons in outlandish shapes and patterns are invading Monkey Town and only Super Monkey can stop them! Equip dozens of powerful weapons, unlock never-before-seen Super Monkeys, and use dozens of screen-clearing powerups to pop every bloon and achieve a perfect diamond ranking.* Fast-action, pop everything fun-fest* 90+ vibrant levels, each with unique bloon waves* Colorful, easy to control family fun for new gamers* Intense skill-based diamond challenges for hardcore players* 90+ weapons including epic powers like Doom Gauntlets, Sidewinder Ace, and Yeti* 40+ bloon shredding powerups like Explosive Shots, Parallel Universe Monkey, and the Sun God* Compare level ranks with your friendsTake to the skies and get popping!-----------Permissions:Bloons Supermonkey 2 may request permission to access your "Photos, Media, and Files" but the game has no interaction with your Photos or Media at all; this permission is only to read and write to your external storage (Files) to buffer rewarded video ads. The main negative is it's completely fixed to try and lure you to purchase better cards and upgrades. You can win 8 games in a row then you lose them, it's about that number every time, coincendence? I think not. it's very hard to even get to castle 6 and we've been trying for about a month.

Your game server is from the stone age.  Too slow. Ruins the entire game.  You charge money for this game.  At least fix the server. Also opponents get gems faster at times.  Prob server issue also.  Editors choice?  They must of played it for 30 min.  Played for a few months. Fed up with frustration.

1.The player with the highest data speed wins the war. 2.I wish  mana can be looted from opponents. 3.I wish there is a clan war. 4.Some epic cards are too expensive that they can never be owned by poor players.  Just a point of view.

comments: Excellent Mmorpg. Definitely best of its kind. Not to big of a dowload. It is only about half a gigabyte. Very complex upgrading systems compared to most. Enjoy many story line quests. Many other missions. Mount system. Many martial arts. Pets. Marraige system. Guilds. Many shops. Nice vanaties. Multiple classes. Definitely a must download. Best of all progression may take time but does not require top up.  Edit: please fix keyboard. Barely works since update.

With full 3D animations and PC-level graphics, Age of Wushu Dynasty transports heroes to Ming Dynasty China, with stylized era outfits and authentic environments modeled on real locations!Struggle for Power with 7 SchoolsChoose from seven Martial Arts Schools to join on the path to discover the power within! Each school offers unique opportunities in an deep character customization system – master the Taichi Sword as a noble Wudang hero, or rain ninja death from the shadows as the cunning Tangmen. descriptionHTML:
The New update for Age of Wushu Dynasty is finally coming to Android platform! Be prepared for the challenge from the legendary faction, Murong Manor. Test the skills of a true master in the new mode Survive In Impasse. Obtain hidden martial art scroll the Great Vajra Finger. Get in the adventure full of dice, sand, and gold. Learn the fourth internal skills, Indefinite Breath Skill! Are you ready to Overturn Heaven and earth?

"An awful lot of things just right!" – Pocket Gamer
"Best Mobile Game at E3” – OnRPG
"Excellent visuals and aesthetic martial arts!” – Touch Arcade
"Sure to be a gorgeous, action-packed game for all to enjoy!” – App Advice

Enter a Stylized World set in Ancient China

Explore a visually stunning virtual world filled with peaceful peach blossom orchards, bustling city streets, and scorched battlefields! With full 3D animations and PC-level graphics, Age of Wushu Dynasty transports heroes to Ming Dynasty China, with stylized era outfits and authentic environments modeled on real locations!

Struggle for Power with 7 Schools

Choose from seven Martial Arts Schools to join on the path to discover the power within! Each school offers unique opportunities in an deep character customization system – master the Taichi Sword as a noble Wudang hero, or rain ninja death from the shadows as the cunning Tangmen. Join a school, master the arts, and compete with opposing schools to discover your destiny!

Heart-pounding Revolutionary Combat

Become a true master of martial arts with Age of Wushu Dynasty’s revolutionary combat system. Go beyond simple hack ‘n slash mechanics with tactical real-time combat. Block incoming attacks, time your parry, and execute feints to break through defenses and defeat your opponent. Master unique skill sets to fight with blades, staffs, daggers, and bare hands! Ignite your Kungfu fire with powerful Rage attacks and destroy your adversaries!

Challenge Rivals in PvP

Who will be the ultimate champion of Jianghu? Enter a cut-throat world of ninja assassins and Kungfu heroes, as players battle it out in organized and open world PvP. Fight your way to the top in 1 on 1 Arena battles. Sneak behind enemy lines with Spycraft, and join together in Guilds to battle for supremacy in PvP Guild Raids!

==Connect==
Visit our official site to learn more about Age of Wushu Dynasty: http://aowd.snail.com/en/
Join the Age of Wushu Dynasty community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum:
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ageofwushudynasty
Community Forum: http://aowdbbs.snail.com/en/

comments: Challenging game against live players. Lots of contests and bonuses. Levels of play from beginner to world class. One drawback: all levels are open entry, so more experienced (and less ethical) players will enter into Beginner to collect quick victories. The designers should change the game so that once a badge is completed, players should not be able to enter games on that level again. This would be fair play for beginners, encouraging them to continue playing. Hope this is implemented in an update.

Game graphics and play are great. However dice rolls are seriously flawed. Doubles way too often. Not even close to real rolling. I've seen 2 sets of doubles in way to many starts of the game. If doubles are so common why don't you ever see 3 doubles in a row to start. Don't ever leave a piece open because the next roll will knock you almost every time. The developer obviously likes frustration proven by the childish limited chat emojis.
They need to fix the dice roll. Its absolutely a big cheat...no way can some roll exactly what they need to get out of a tight position that often. Its really horrible it ruins the whole game.

I think it's safe to say based on the dice timing, that this game app, like all the rest, is favoring a particular player in order to end the game quicker. The auto play is annoying and not possible to turn off.. but the layout is nice.

It's the worst game i have ever played , they are thieves , when you double and you lose they deduct twice the bet and when u win they only give you 45 percent of ur total winning money.I played a game and won 255 thousand , but they only gave me 120 thousand , and when i lost they took out 255 thousand from my money.If you dont believe me count ur chips and see.They suck so go to hell with this lame unfair idiot game.
The dice rolling is not random at all !  It gives ridiculously lucky dices and game over in 3 or 4 turns. Do not play it. NO RANDOM DICE, NO FUN AT ALL !!!

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

comments: I think it is a great game and great concept. Then in the stories characters would send pictures and videos. Great except you have to pay to see them. Not pay and boom you see stuff permanently, but its a weekly, monthly, or yearly thing like its a PlayStation plus account. There are ways of making money without doing this, its called advertisements. Yea they are annoying but they work. I would rather deal with ads and experience the full game then have the game be free but I have to pay for parts locked behind a pay wall. Aside from that the game is great.

Well the reason I put a zero on the graphics was bc I didn't get to see them.😢 I just wanted to let you know that I want to request a update on the game maybe just like let people see the video chats and not the pictures. It was really hard knowing what it was talking about. Overall I like it!😀

Most stories are good but its Very very very pay to read. With weekly and yearly subscriptions. After reading every story in 1 day, i canceled my free trial and uninstalled. I refuse to pay 3 dollars a week. Or even 50 a year to just sit and wait for them to come up with more material. On top of the subscription cost they ALSO have gems you buy and spend on making the fun choices in the stories. So my advice it to start your free trial, cancel it, read every story in a day. And then uninstall and thank me for not spending money to wait weeks for one more story.

I love these stories because they're  breathe taking, mysterious, juicy, horrifying, gruesome and just amazing. I find clifhanger inspiring because it gives me bazaar ideas for when I want to write a horra story. However, I don't like the idea of paying because when I first downloaded this app I read the first story and while I was reading the story a blurred picture appeared so I was so excited but when I went to click on it, it said I hat to pay which was quite disappointing but other then that I feel like this app was a realy good idea I feel like it was well made well organised and well planned

I understand this would be good entertainment for some, but honestly the set up you have is bad. having to pay multiple time to see a video or anything that is added as an extra is bad enough, having wait time are worse. On top of all of it the stories are lack luster. Please fix it.
I love the app it's amazing. I advise u to download it but pls put ads bc u have to wait 14 mins I mean I'd rather watch ads than wait 14mins it just makes me angry.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires!
There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends.

★ BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!

comments: Not really easy to understand how to get started playing the game. I had to figure out a lot of it for myself but having to do that got frustrating so after a few days I just decided to uninstall it. It presents as cute and entertaining but trying to learn a game with minimal instruction doesn't give a great first impression

This is one of my favorite mobile games. My only issue recently is I spent money on coins after a level to finally finish it but the game crashed and I ended up having to start the game over smh it keeps crashing but this is the first time it crashed without fixing itself...hope you guys do something about that

Update: I read where you stated" Our developers only release levels after they personally ensure that levels  are beatable without the use of purchase's".  I was wondering, do they play a level for a week like I am so far trying to complete it? Are they really playing or it's what the computer tells them? I doubt that any of you are actually playing this game.

I have played this game for months and it was fantastic until the last 2 updates. After those the levels became so hard it's impossible to beat them without spending money. If you enjoy playing the same level for weeks at a time then by all means download. Otherwise don't waste your time unless you want to spend money.

Fun game but today while I have been playing, when I hit give up it keeps going to the 25 coins for 5 more moves no matter how many times I hit it. I have had to exit the app and reopen it to play the level again without spending coins. I hope this is just a glitch and not trying to get people to spend more money.

I love this game however, it has taken multiple lives from me for no reason. The game starts you off with 5 lives & then I accrued 10 lives from winning multiple lives from extra spins. All of a sudden the lives just disappeared and I was reduced to just 5 lives again. This is the 2nd time this happened to me which sucks cause the game is fun as hell.

comments: The game is great! Love the handling and graophics... But I would suggest making the drift angle wider. So instead of hitting 90° and then the counter says "combo broken" it could be something like 100°! Cause I mean... Reverse entries are awesome! And you should make the hoonicorn Mustang 4wd instead of rwd in the drift setup!!

I really enjoy this game. Ive maxed out purchases on tracks n cars, modified them all. Now its TOO hard to gain coins to open cars and much exciting tracks.. no updates on additional tracks.. think the optjons should be reviewed. Its now once you get where you are the only way to gain more is to go online to TRY and get coins to get anywhere... which sucks!!!!!

This game won't let me purchase anything. Everytine I start the app I get the "validation error" pop-up. I've sent mails to support, left multiple comments but nothing happens. I just get ignored. I am truly over his game with the level of support I am receiving, which is absolutely ZERO!

One thing: (two things actually)  Please make the drift school car available to buy with at least in-game cash maybe for a limited time? And please add a feature that gives you the ability to save replays, that would be really cool.

I think it should have ALOT more cars. I also think that they should alow custom decals and visual upgrades. Also a better online platform. Like a real time multiplayer. Other then that it's an OK game.  Its not been over a year and...it seems like they update this game every...6-7 months, really bad. Gets reallly boring 🤦🏽‍♂️

Love the game! But since the update I'm unable to purchase cars/cash. Every time I open the game it says I need to connect to the internet to make purchases even though I'm connected and can still play multiplayer etc. Any help would be great

comments: There is a LOT of things to do and keep track of in this game.  Definitely more than just a single point and click - theres some semblance of depth and especially with alliances, attack, and defense.

This game is a complete copy of Clash of Kings (same company, different name, different address in Kowloon), but it's well made and fair in terms of team play, and if you choose to pay, doesn't require a ton of money.  If you enjoy team play, it's a great game.  If you want a sim-city game where everyone leaves you alone, good luck!

The "gameplay" videos are fake. You do not get to have huge wars with the undead. It's nothing more then a waiting game unless you spend large sums of real money and even then the game is a lie it is not what they advertise and should be taken down for this reason alone. There are enough scam games as it is but this one is just depressing.
I love the game the only problem I have had is loading my Avatar after uploading it and spending 1600 in Gold I still do not have it loaded yet.
Uses gameplay from other games in their false advertising campaigns. Apparently, they also buy good reviews.
There’s a problem with game regenerating new rss that’s why you can see any rss and their levels. i mean you cannot see any new rss and their level
description: Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.Features:Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
descriptionHTML:
Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.

When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!

In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.

Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.

In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.

Features:

Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;
Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;
Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;
Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;
Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;

When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.

The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!

Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.

Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
developerAddress: Suite 603, 6/F, Laws Commercial Plaze, 788 Cheung Sha Wan Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong

summary: Brand New Strategy Game, Battle to Win the Showdown with AI Robots and Zombies
title: Art of War : Last Day

comments: This game was absolutely perfect and was very much enjoyable, but now to unlock the full experience you have to pay. One of the reasons I enjoy this game and recommended it to my friends is because it is one of the only games that isn't locked behind a paywall. Overall, I have had countless hours playing this game, and trying to land on everything and return successfully. Instead of the microtransaction, why not institute a merit-based system for unlocking parts?

Very great!  Here are a few suggestion from me to make your game more enjoyable :)  1. Can you please make the earth scale correctly because its diameter is around 12.000 km and moon orbit is around 380.000 km  2. Please make a smaller powerful engine like the 9 engines of the falcon 9  3. Please make a button that is simple to cycle from another rocket to another one to ease the attempt of landing a booster  4. Please add an ocean on the earth for some splashdown  5. The last one. Im a free 2 play player and i cant enjoy a majority of the new update :*(

This game is awsome. Loads of fun. Told my friends about it. Could you add a free sandbox mode and more free parts. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Shouldn't have added micro transactions. It just ruined the game for me. Had to take it from a 5 star to a 3 star. Please bear this comment in mind for future updates. This game was 100% free when i downloaded it in december last year. Since then, you added a new build system, free parts which make the game absolutely amazing, and then you add pay for parts. Thats just buzzkill.

Very fast and simple rocket building and great graphics. I wish there was a sandbox mode with infinite fuel. Also there is no indication for loading screens when you hit the launch button. Somethimes you think you tapped the button and end up sitting there for a minute or two wasting time.  Edit So glad they made a small payment option. Well worth the money and glad to support

Great!  Only thing I miss is the ability to rendezvous and dock with another object.  In a moon landing, you could leave a stage in lunar orbit and pick it up for the outbound burn.  Also, karman line should be 100 km??  Edit:. Great updates.  I have no idea how to use docking to reattach parts that have been undocked though.

Can you please add option to center the map on the rocket/vehicle when being in the map mode? It is difficult to switch between near objects in the current version, since I assume the map is stationary relative to the body in which influence sphere we're in at that moment. Also, a "docking guide" would be cool in some future update
description: This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.• Realistic orbital mechanics• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.Current planets and moons:• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9CVideo tutorials: Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQMoon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
descriptionHTML:
This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!

• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.
• Realistic orbital mechanics
• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.

Current planets and moons:
• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)
• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)
• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)
• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)
• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)
• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)

Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9C

Video tutorials:
Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQ
Moon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
developerAddress: Leona Zalaznika 4 Maribor
recentChanges: Added: Fairings, Probes, RCS, Solar panels and one new engine [Free].
Increased build space height by 2 [Free].
Added option to get a parts extension with: Docking, Rovers and Big parts and Extra build space (The extension also includes ALL future parts), I really tried to make this the best deal I can :P
Quick fix: Fixed problem with purchase, if your problem is still there, try restarting or reinstalling.
Major performance improvements.
Added clear all debris button.
summary: Space has never been this easy, or this hard!
title: Spaceflight Simulator

description: Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run! Race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the SPECIAL NEW CHARACTER, PRINCESS ANGELA! She lives in a magical place called MEDIEVAL TOWN. So, get ready to go for the gold in this exciting SIDE WORLD. Or test your snowboarding skills in the Snowboard Side World! Race snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there! Whether you’re a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL! ★ Get a rush as you run through the subway tunnel to the new side world, Medieval Town. ★ Race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard – it’s super cool!!!★ Meet special guest star, Princess Angela, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold! Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter! ★★★ENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN★★★ENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards! BUILD AMAZING HOMES: Use the gold bars you collect to build homes for Talking Tom and Friends! UNLOCK NEW RUNNING WORLDS: Explore even more fun worlds when you upgrade your home! RUN WITH SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters!PLAY FOR FREE! This app contains:The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;The option to make in-app purchases;Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);Promotions for Outfit7’s products, as well as advertising;Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;Videos to watch starring Outfit7’s animated characters via YouTube integration; andLinks that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps.This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/Customer support: support@outfit7.com

GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold!

Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter!

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). Anyway, besides this i do not regret playing the game, easy controls, f2p friendly, graphics is good, controls are good. Keep up the good work devs!looking forward to more updates
For the love of God let me grammar check your game...
Very nice and addictive game, i like it.  Would be nicer if pvp is already availble
Nice game. I just hope more free diamonds to be given during quests :)
I love the game but what happened to pk cus you guys are an different company

Downloaded the game just to see LoL heroes like Ahri and Sona on action only to found out most of them in preview screenshots doesn't exist in-game. But overall a fun game and f2p friendly.  Edit: upped my rating to 5 after 5 days playing, you guys deserve it. Keep up the good work. :)

description: Choose your path to greatness in the all-new season of EA SPORTS NBA LIVE. Build your team, dominate opponents, boost your Rep, upgrade players, take over the Blacktop, and connect with the NBA in Live Events. Capture the spotlight and create your legacy in the world’s most downloaded basketball game.LEAD A TOP SQUAD Create the ultimate roster as you upgrade players, rain buckets, and rise up the ranks in the NBA. With Chemistry, choose and match players that mirror their coach’s playstyle, allowing you to focus on shooting, defensive, a run-and-gun style, and more to get boosts and elevate your game. Get your team in the zone to become the league’s best squad. GAIN YOUR REPBeat opponents in Head-to-Head matches and Leagues to earn Rep. Use it to earn special packs or Rank Up players to their maximum performance level. The higher your players’ levels, the better they’ll play on the court. Strategy rules in this battle for victory. OWN THE BLACKTOPNo quarters. No shot clock. No rules. Head outdoors to the blacktop and build a lineup of classic players to compete against other NBA legends and prove yourself on the courts where bonafide ballers are made. From Brooklyn to Chicago to Venice Beach, experience a different feel and unique events that keep the stakes high and the wins rolling in. COMPETE IN LIVE EVENTSConnect to the NBA all year long with daily challenges that keep you raining buckets on the way to the top. Score incredible rewards in real-life matchups and break ankles in Seasons or Head-to-Head mode with friends and foes. Become a hoop master all day, every day.This app: requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply); Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.; includes in-game advertising; collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.*Facebook login required. Must be 13 years or older.

comments: A game that passes the time but way too many ads. Otherwise mindless fun. I have reached past level 700 and the new update freezes when you win the level and doesn't mark it as a win. You have to back out and start all over only to have it freeze again. Will probably delete it as it's now useless to try to play.

Frustrated.  I was in the 2000+ level and I just got a new phone.  All of my apps got transferred.  Went to bubbles and it started me back at level 1.  I will be disabling.  I can't start over and I spent money for more tokens.  Very angry.

I don't mind ads, but one after every round is excessive, especially when you can't skip them. Perhaps consider only ads you can't skip when requested, like for bonuses and prizes. I've quickly come to love this game, but I also love plenty of games who get by on much less frequent and interfering advertising. . You're generic response doesn't address anything I said except the target word "ads." I'm talking about ads you can't skip after many levels.  Save the unskippable ads for when we choose to watch them.

Enjoyed the different level challenges -having to drop all the balls with fewer of your own. Do get fed up with adverts at times. One or two won't clear screen and have to shut down game to resume playing

One of the best bubble/ball shooter games. And yes very addictive.  Only 2 negatives... bubble at the bottom unable to move to the left or right as in another favorite game. Secondly there is a creepy ad or something dark that pops up periodically between games.

Between every level guess what? Ads, ads and more adds . I hate it! I understand that ads will help you as developer somewhat but how it will help you if we , users going to instantly uninstall your app and rate it low? Maybe it is time for a different aproach since it is abosolutely anoying that level of ads?

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

He uses all abilities with 0 cool down time, he keeps getting armor, shield, and healing... making winning impossible, unless you are +20 levels higher than him.

It's a fun, easy, addictive game. My ONLY complaint is that even when you buy a card, you don't get to CHOOSE which Character you are getting. If I'm paying $100 for something, I better get to PICK what I'm getting - this game doesn't let you do that.  I also think it takes WAY TOO LONG to evolve Characters, and overall the add-ons are FAR TOO EXPENSIVE for what you are getting, but you don't HAVE TO spend money if you don't want to.

The game is a great game, I love how they added characters from all eras, it sorta reminds me of turtles in time. The only huge downfall of this game is that it's pretty much a pay to play game smh. I've never seen a game that is so money hungry in my life. The $10 monthly subscription  is absurd, the SFX ingame dont work and for 5 bucks more you can play Elder scrolls online that has a ton of content compare to this game.

Subscription should come with better benefits. $10 a month...6 months worth I could've bought an xbox game. Ya know. Pizza re-gen should be a bit quicker. Some people like to grind. And the pizza limitation kills the grind. Good graphics tho, and great characters. But waaaay to hard to acquire the turtles. Big let down on that aspect

Great game just wished Very amazing game especially if you are a turtles fan.. lots of choices with characters.. you can definitely get stronger without having to pay.. you just need to put in the time , and do  do daily event's.. i wish some characters were easier to get;))

After a long battle with the worst customer service i have ever dealt with i will regrettably no longer be playing this game. The game itself is pretty solid but is a money sink. If you need help from the company you may as well quit. The game is a solid 4/5 but the company's attitude and considering you being disposable sadly makes them a 1/10

descriptionHTML:
Bros vs Foes!

At every turn, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have thwarted Kraang Prime’s plans to terraform the Earth into Dimension X. What’s an evil overlord to do? Hatch a nefarious new scheme, to create an army of Ultra Mutants! Everywhere, the Kraang have kidnapped mutants - including the Ninja Turtles - for their DNA!

With his brothers pulled through a Kraang Dimension X portal, Leonardo must recruit the Ninja Turtles’ allies and foes alike before it’s too late.

Hang on to your shells!

ORIGINAL NINJAS: Explore the Turtles universe with an All-New Original story. Battle your way through 7 chapters and over 70 stages to take on the baddest of bosses – Shredder, Kraang and more!
RESPECT THE SHELL: For a limited-time, play and experience an all-new chapter based on this summer’s blockbuster, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows! When their recon mission goes awry, the Turtles must take on the Foot Clan and favourite bad boys Bebop and Rocksteady! Fight to win and collect these exclusive characters!
TURTLE POWER: Help Leonardo as he takes on the Kraang army to save his brothers and fellow mutants. Play alongside Leonardo in a 5-on- 5 battle with your favorite TMNT characters.
MUTANT MAYHEM: Collect and level up over 30 TMNT characters! Train them to learn their super sweet moves and build your Turtle-rrific team! Don’t forget to pack your freezer for Ice Cream Kitty!
SHRED ALERT: For the very first time, fight the Kraang as a Ninja Turtle friend… or FOE! Collect and play as Tiger Claw, Rocksteady, Bebop, and more. Create strategic teams and take on the Kraang!
FOOD FIGHT: Collect daily prizes and card packs to enhance your team!
WE RUN THIS TOWN: Fight against the Kraang in the Ninja Turtles’ favorite locations from the TV show, including Dimension X, the sewers and the classic New York City rooftops!

Gentlemen, let’s save the world!

--

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends collects non-personal user data (including aggregated data) and connects with 3rd party social media applications.

Please note, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

For users residing in the EU, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device.

comments: Despite some occasional issues with support from the developers, this is one of the best mobile games I've ever played. Now that they're finally adding new content regularly, it keeps me interested day after day.
Won't even let me play not worth your time.

Not a bad game, don't need money really to level up and get to a good standing against others. It goes pretty quick till level 65ish  and starts to slow down. If you want to spend money it helps speed leveling and getting your guys up stronger faster obviously. If you have patience and don't mind not leveling to fast, or just taking your time in general this game is for you. Lots to do. My favorite part is trying to find a way to make my team the strongest I can, using the massively different combos of hero's u can use and all the things you can add to them to make them stronger. You can literally go with a 1 man team or a 5 man team based on materials u have to equip them with to make sure they can last in battle. Have fun and good luck all... Been playing for 100 days now, game is getting better players  wise, support  wise not so hot.. they only get back to you when they feel like it I guess, there was a problem I had like a month ago they kinda jumped on right away. But I messaged them a few days ago and they have yet to reply... Gonna drop the stars due to this. Love the game tho, be better to your players developers..

comments: I love many aspects of the game, but there are some seriously frustrating issues. After accidentally clicking through the out of food warnings twice I think I'm done playing. description: Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.Story of the World- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand?  That is for you to decide.- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide. Every decision you make is of vital importance.Class & Adventure- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like. Your Imagination is the only limit.- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!Battle & Speed- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!Classic placing and gain mode- No pains but gains Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.======Contact Us======FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2GROUP: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2/groupsREDDIT: https://www.reddit.com/r/DungeonSurvivor2/DISCORD: https://discord.gg/FhyPQpW
descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.
