description: In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!• A detailed damage system.THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play. So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!__HOT WHEELS and associated trademarks and trade dress are owned by, and used under license from, Mattel. ©2017 Mattel. descriptionHTML:
In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!

REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!
• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.
• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!
• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.
• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!

GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8
• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!
• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.
• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.

EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS
• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!

comments: Poker is a lot like dating.

I used to love this app. They updated it a few weeks ago and I hate it. I'm not able to get into a game without waiting. Maybe there is a way around that but I haven't figured it out. It's not user friendly like it used to be. I'm uninstalling this app.

This last update (1.94.2) is f***ed. I constantly get logged out randomly in the middle of a hand and am forced to fold. Also, the filters for games have been generalized so I can no longer narrow down to the game type I want. That one is not even a bug just an awful bewildering design change.

I have been playing on this site for at least 14 years now I loved it I played with real money but in last 4 or 5 years I haven't been able to play with real money I do spend reel money to buy fake chips I'm not happy with the new settings that I can't find the tables that I like to play and can't play with real money let me tell you that until you fix this and change your settings back the way it was few days ago I wound play and I Will ask all my friends that I referred to this site to stop playing and deposit.  So please fix the problem.  Thanks
It's an ok app. Noticed to many patterns to believe it's random. Don't play real money unless you feel comfortable throwing it away. Most player's who seem to win are from some third world country.
Start page doesn't open on fave game.  Can't reload chips ahead of time.  Also, seating distribution needs attention on Omaha tables.

comments: More and more focus on pay to win and the 4th weapon, the distance weapon makes it too complex and disturbing. In particular the boomerangs because there are almost no chances to avoid a hit. In unequal battles the inferior just got an extra disadvantage --> no David vs goliath anymore possible. It sucks

This is the worst chapter or update in  the game.. when I saw notification of the update I was very excited but when I opened this game the main quest was insane difficulty so I started side quest which was easy difficulty, but it was not for me it was easy for the enemy.. I played that more than 10 times but I didn't win 2 rounds so I just came here and wrote this review... And if you think I'm a noob.. then yes I am but only in this chapter not in previous ones..

At first look it didn't mesmerise me, but after 2-3 matches I feel in love with it! It is awesome and has tons of weapons and other stuffs. The multiplayer option is also great and chest opening is such a treat. One worry is that the weapon below the primary weapon is still locked (why I don't know), otherwise the game is superb. Graphics are top notch and fighting doesn't come more realistic than that!

I have been playing SF3 for quite a long time til now and I just got a problem with one side mission. It was the "Head hit only" with an Accused. I play as the judge and all. However, when I hit him like a combos of headhits, it didnt hurt him at all. It is like he became invincible. Anyway, I love everything of SF3. The storyline, gameplay, graphic and so on, they are all great. And I hope you would fix that one single problem of mine along with others who have the problem of crashing as I had read the comments. That is all for me. Keep up the good work, Nekki.

After the latest update, in side quest - wasteland I won twice both the times the game hung up but when the opponent wins it moves through to next easily. I can attach the screen shot of wanted.. kindly fix this it's frustrating  Now for the third time this has happened gonna uninstall the game bye

The 1st Main Mission of chapter 4 hot stucked. I deafeated my opponent and it has stocked at that point. Closed the game and started again, the the mission is in same position. Again I played that mission and after defeating the game stucked again. The same thing happened 5 times in a row. Very much Dissapointed.
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

comments: If you like flying WW2 era fighters then you'll love this game. Even for being a mobile game I am impressed with everything the game offers. The only thing I do not like is Android users,like myself, cannot fly the plane from the cockpit, hopefully that option will be available soon!

Awesome game, awesome graphics and gameplay! Controls I rated four stars due to sluggish firing it seems....or...it could be my device too. Im not exactly sure. Also, not a deal breaker, could we shut off the verbal commentary during battle and keep the sound effects? That'd be awesome. Great game all around though.

When I first started playing this game a while ago it was great. Alot of fun. But after every update it gets less enjoyable. Originally gave it 5 stars but I honestly can't agree to that any more. Especially with the tokens and duplicate planes. I have no reason to spend any money, the tokens are useless and after 18 duplicate planes I just won't buy crates. Not worth it.

Game is a POS. They used to work pretty well then they started upgrading everything and now it doesn't work hardly at all. Massive disconnects tons of unplayable lag. So far the only thing I found that works well in this game is the buy me button.. they don't seem to have a problem with that part of the game it works very well the rest of the game sucks.!

I like this game, its the best WW2 Airfight game. I play many WW2 Airfight game in android, but this is the best one. Good Job War Wings. Can you make more than 4 vs 4 or 8 vs 8 in big map or something more than 4 vs 4? It will be look like war games not PVP, just advice. Keep the good work.

The game is great but the enemy planes should have a health bar or something like that. You could also introduce clouds where there is almost no visibility and some power ups based on experience pts of a plane.. But still a really nice game

Take to the skies and join the battle in epic WWII dogfights! Climb into the cockpit of your fully customisable warplane and get ready for take-off - your mission is about to begin!

Be an ace pilot! Fly solo as a lone wolf or team up with your squadron to control the skies. Pull off gravity-defying stunts and tricks, get the enemy in your sights and hit the trigger to shoot them down. It’s life or death up there, and only the bravest and most skilled pilots will survive!

War Wings lets you fly into the heat of the action in multiplayer PVP dogfights. Compete against millions of players worldwide, destroy enemy squadrons and climb the global leaderboards. Show the world that you own the skies!

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.
description: Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)DESCRIPTIONThis is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.FEATURES● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the gameSUPPORTAre you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.Forums & Guide:English:    https://goo.gl/ecChhsWiki:http://gdmaze.wikia.comTerms of Service:http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.htmlIt's necessary to use the below permissions:RECORD_AUDIOThere is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.The video below shows how it works in the game:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be  GET_ACCOUNTSIn order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.
descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

comments: Good app but few glitches. One day I was playing against computer. It made a miraculous move of eating my pawn at a place where none of my pawn ever existed. Awesome. :P Net connectivity is as good that when other apps show good connection under high speed wifi, ot shows no connectivity. Lol

Freakking great. Best chess app EVER!!!!. I have the free one and it can teach you tactics, help you in situations and if you dont want that no need to do it. You can even costumize your wallpaper or theme. Skill ratings 100-2600 playing real people. Or you can play a computer, 400-1200 or 1400 i think. Great app, get it you wont regret it.

I think this app is horrible simply.. I'm a diamond member, but I don't think i will be for much longer. There's other chess sites that don't disconnect and lag so much. Main dislikes is the constant disconnection, no order at all in the videos section. Tactics, lessons and drills bugs and crashes when turning the mobile or screen goes off. Specially drills bugs and just repeats the same one over and over when you finished instead of going to the next one. Also, app was unhappy I was logged in on my turned off computer.. come on..

I cannot respond to chats. The support team promises they will fix the issue, but it's only lies so that I can give the app a decent rating. Now my custom board, pieces, and background settings get reset every 2 days. Frustrating app.

The last update sucks! Premove is not at all intuitive. It now just shows the block which we want to move the pawn and doesn't move the pawn itself like before. The toast message that showed 'challenge rejected' was better than the current one. Dislike it!!
I have no connection issues but some times game discontinues with showing no n/w.pls solve otherwise good game Finally uninstalled... Worst team.

comments: Really not a fan of the daily crates being replaced by the fortune wheel. 2 silver crates and a gold every week replaced by what is essentially a bronze crate every day and occasionally a gold, if you're very lucky. Also, why replace, billion, trillion, jillion etc. With numbers? At a glance it's much more confusing.
Typical app game that is fun at first but then game progress slows down. Therefore encouraging the player to purchase items to advance farther into the game. Yawn.
Don't download, i got sooooooo far and then all of a sudden it deleted all of my work and progress. Don't get it

I am not sure how to add my friends on this app. So, it's Really putting me down. He has a iPhone and I have a Samsung. Don't download this at all if you're expecting to play with friends. It doesn't work
Glitches with bonuses not working in space make it to boring to continue.
Worst game . My whole Family is no longer playing. Gems for tasks you never get and all the ads.
description: Build your empire one city at a time in this new tap idler sure to make you money hungry! Tap to make money, tap to upgrade your city’s business buildings, and tap some more! Unlock, hire, and collect as many Advisors and Bizbots as you can to upgrade your business value, build your cities faster, and earn a stash of cash as you rise from rags to riches! Valuable Adviser bonuses will have you tapping even faster! Can you become a billionaire business tycoon or will you fail as a capitalist?From the creators of Coin Dozer and Brick Breaker Hero, Taps to Riches will have you tapping everywhere you go!- Expand your empire into multiple cities with unique challenges- Hundreds of hilarious Advisers who add valuable business bonuses! Collect them all!- Dare to reset your progress and take advantage of Bizbots, a precious resource that give you even more money bonuses per tap!- Buy and upgrade your businesses to see them evolve into architectural masterpieces!- Tons of Bonuses and Achievements for you to discover with all of your tapping frenzy!- More features to come!Taps to Riches is a unique city building simulation game with tap and click mechanics. Upgrade businesses in game to make money and earn extra cash as you venture into new cities.   Start from the bottom as a newly freed villain with big dreams of once again achieving world domination. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you. Hire valuable Advisors to unlock special business bonuses, and use Bizbot resources for even more cash bonuses!

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesome😒 Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

The game is good. There are problems though. D-muscle is absolutely useless. It's the worst car in the muscle set and has no business being the fourth car in that set. The final upgrades for the fourth car on all sets are far too expensive. It requires an insane amount of grinding to unlock the last cars. The prices of supercharged upgrades are all over the place. Why do all of Haulinator's cost 100 coins while Dune It Up's cost 1000-2000?

Game would be good if the dev's took time to work out the huge amount of bugs. Everytime I run this, I get 3 races deep then everything stops responding. Running it on Samsung Galaxy S9+ with perfect cell service. All the buttons click but do nothing. Uninstalled.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

My 2 almost 3 year old and I really like this game. It's pretty fun BUT it seems to freeze up after a few races and I have to shut the game off and restart it to play more. This obviously frustrates little man and I'm sure I'm not the only one this has happened to. Other than that, we think it's a great game.

Good graphics. If you fail and do exact same again you may pass level if you level up car, you end up failing sooner and have to slow down but after trying 7 r 8 times gets annoying and the level up car is worse than your basic car. Too frustrating so deleting

comments: This has a lot of potential. Connection issues are horrendous after this last update. Also, add a help section that explains what everything means. Lots of stats, numbers, ratings, etc. that we have to figure out on our own. Another thing, stopped receiving notifications after updating to Oreo.
Overall it's pretty fun and addicting.  My only real issue came up with today's update. My 40-rated team got matched to play against a 60-rated team in my first Challenge game. wut

The game was great until the update. Took my team from a 43 to a 41. Put alot of time into it, hope this gets worked out. They also nerfed training. Don't even bother wasting 15 coins on an extra session.

Update: ***500 coins for ~350k in game cash isnt even 1 rookie signing.... you can get 3 star players for that kind of coin. **** the latest updates have added cool new features like the coach analysis, fewer bugs and more consistency. The coach analysis function could be cool but every description is "this player is making great progress, keep pushing him!" Even for aging players who are getting worse as the seasons progress. It does however project where the player could trend stats wise.  Still no goalie stats. Still no trade options (not sure how that would wotk) but they added refunds to contracts you release from your roster which depend on the player and their contract value,  time remaining etc...  Would be cool to also be able to make in game adjustments, like if your star goalie is letting goal after goal slip through swapping goal tenders would be nice otherwise there doesn't really seem to be a point in having 2 goalies even on the roster.  Overall it's a Fun game with a LOT of potential, if you're a fan of hockey you should definitely give this a try. Would like to see some of these things as the game develops

Please fix how it automatically signs a new player if you don't renew a contract.. the purpose is to dump cap space and it signs some random player and then won't let me release him.  Also STOP changing my line ups. At any point any time ever. There's no need to change it or else you night as well play the game for me. I spend alot of time re doing them and then next thing I know every thing is changed. Not sure why or what causes it buy it is annoying as hell

Overall it is a decent game. However finding an opponent for the games especially the rank games sucks. Either you get another player who is far superior to you or another who is far below your level. It needs to be more equal to be fun.

comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Great game but some levels really hard I cant pasd this one level im on for days maybe update make it easier pass level I'm on I just did update...I hope so... love game anyways great game to.. identical cooking joy to map was a great game to but also hard get passed certain levels that game to n I can try play fast with my hands to still cant pass to not playing  cooking joy anymore going stick with this one see if game gets easier to

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. 👍
description: PREPARE 🔪, COOK 🕑and SERVE 🍕 delicious meals from all over the world 🌎 in Cooking Madness!  Become the master chef 👨‍🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year it’s this highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience!  Get yourself in a real cooking craze. Cook like you’re a MAD CHEF in Cooking Madness! Did the cooking fever caught on and you can’t get enough of 🍨 cooking games? Then this is THE cooking game for you! You’ll be serving delicious dishes 🍩 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants in a ⏩ FAST pace. No challenge that can’t be beaten by you. Dash from restaurant to restaurant on this magical map. You will discover and unlock many places as you progress on your journey. 🌄 Get the restaurants back to business and attract more and more customers. Let the Cooking Madness begin! description: Join the excitement and high adrenaline rush of Pro 11’s fantasy soccer leagues and tournaments to become the best soccer manager in the world!Find out if you have what it takes to become a top ranked soccer manager, oversee your soccer club and dominate your national soccer league, as well as the Champions League! Pro 11 brings you the combined action and thrill of running a soccer fantasy league and playing with soccer  clubs such as Madrid, Barcelona, to build your dream team of superstar soccer  players. It’s up to you to create the line-up, manage transfers, conduct training sessions, negotiate sponsor deals and much more.Manage your own soccer club with Pro 11 and compete against the best soccer teams from soccer leagues across the world. Pro11 is the perfect match for any soccer enthusiasts that follow the soccer leagues such as the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Ligue 1 and the legendary Champions League. descriptionHTML:
Join the excitement and high adrenaline rush of Pro 11’s fantasy soccer leagues and tournaments to become the best soccer manager in the world!

Find out if you have what it takes to become a top ranked soccer manager, oversee your soccer club and dominate your national soccer league, as well as the Champions League! Pro 11 brings you the combined action and thrill of running a soccer fantasy league and playing with soccer clubs such as Madrid, Barcelona, to build your dream team of superstar soccer players. It’s up to you to create the line-up, manage transfers, conduct training sessions, negotiate sponsor deals and much more.

Manage your own soccer club with Pro 11 and compete against the best soccer teams from soccer leagues across the world. Pro11 is the perfect match for any soccer enthusiasts that follow the soccer leagues such as the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Ligue 1 and the legendary Champions League.

Instant Action – Advance by Dominating Your National soccer League

Pro 11 is your best fantasy soccer game for instant action! With Pro 11, you have complete control over your soccer matches, you can instantly decide when you want to play, and you always play against other human soccer managers. While other multiplayer games rely on specific match times, Pro 11 allows you to showcase your soccer manager skills whenever you’re online and dominate your fantasy soccer league. Lead your team to the top of your national fantasy league and advance all the way to the Champions League.

Experience the excitement of managing your favourite soccer club – Engage on all levels

Bid for players as you track the live soccer transfer market, train your squad, negotiate contracts for your soccer players, and enjoy real time soccer management for your team’s soccer matches. Top graphics and Captivating Gameplay

comments: Once you progress a little the tournaments become more like roulette than poker. After a few hands in a 24 player tournament the blind levels can reach c. 1/4 of your chips!!!

Most unstable game app I've played. App crashes frequently during play. I've had the app crash when about to receive chips. Also, this is a very slow loading app taking at least 10x to 20x longer to run even when quickly toggling back and forth between apps.
Paid for this game only to have microtansactions making it where if I lose a couple games and don't make enough I have to pay more money to continue playing.
Its a fun way to kill time. I wish the blinds wouldn't start with me each game. In the big money games, losing the first blinds  can mean quite alot.
I loved this game on pc now on my note 8 I can have it everywhere offline play makes it that much better thank you youda games
Thank goodness for rent By my calculations I have only squandered 1M chips

descriptionHTML:
Play single player holdem poker on your Android and beat every cowboy in Texas in this great Texas Hold'em Poker RPG game called Governor of Poker 2 Premium.

Millions of poker players have enjoyed Governor of Poker, without an internet connection.
With an easy Texas Holdem poker tutorial for players that don't know how to play poker, but want to learn poker and good opponents for star poker players with real poker skills!
The poker chips you win are required to buy houses, win transportation, play against advanced poker AI opponents, win Texas and beat the new Governor of Poker.

•Get ready for many hours and hours of Hold'm Poker play:
- Over 80 challenging poker opponents to beat;
- 27 stunning card saloons in 19 amazing Texas Holdem cities;
- Get hold of the five big poker assets.

•Amazing Texas Poker AI Engine:
A great poker engine will challenge new poker players and world poker champions alike.
Refine your tactics to match the countless poker playing styles of your opponents and watch them go "Steamy" and Tilt after showing off your great card bluffs!
Players will play better in each new city and poker tournament, no cheating allowed!

•Full Story:
Governor of Poker 2 starts where the first game ended.
A new Dallas government decided to put a ban on all Texas Holdem poker games and now considers the game to be illegal.
Time to take matters in your own hands and prove them wrong! Poker isn't a game of luck, but requires poker skill.

•Play Always and Everywhere Offline Poker, no internet connection required:
Because there is no live internet connection needed to play a good game of Texas hold'em poker, you can just play Governor of Poker 2 offline anywhere you want!
Don't wait for human players in multiplayer poker games, that don't respond or leave the pokergame or go allin all the time. Just play this offline poker game !

•Customize poker characters:
Prove you are a bigshot by customizing your poker style to fit your reputation. Be sure to visit one of the many great hat shops across Texas and get yourself the poker deluxe hat of your dreams!
The game includes HD Poker graphics for a great experience on all Android phones and tablets.

Travel through Texas by Train, Casino Boat or Stage Coach and play poker whilst on your way to the next poker city in Texas.
Every city has lots of exciting cash games and big poker tournaments with even bigger Chip prizes, competition and bigger tournaments. You’ll experience more checks, calls, raises, folds and all-ins than you can imagine!
Enjoy sit-n-go tournaments, Shootout tournaments, Bounty tournaments, Cash games.

** NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED **
You don't need an internet connection and don't have to wait for other poker players, it's an offline poker game.

Have you always been a Texas holde'm pokee fanatic? You'll love Governor of Poker 2! What are you waiting for partner? Click install, download and prove you're worthy of the great poker title: GOVERNOR OF POKER !

**** Governor of Poker 2 Reviews ****
- Gamezebo: "Makes poker accessible without being too simple. Great sense of personality. Excellent poker tutorial.. It's a Royal Flush."
- Jayisgames: "Governor of Poker 2 is well-made, highly accessible, and surprisingly addictive for all kinds of players."
- Zylom: "Play this challenging poker game now!"
- Miniclip 5 stars out of 5: "Howdy! Finally it’s here, Governor of Poker 2! Packed with lots and lots of poker extra’s! More cities to conquer and tournaments to play!"

** NOTE:
Please contact support@youdagames.com if you have any issues or suggestions, we would love to help!
You can also follow us at Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/governorofpoker2

Go download Governor of Poker 2 and enjoy the Texas Holdem Poker Adventure!

comments: i bought this game on my samsung galaxy s4 octa core version and it looks more of lagplay and not gameplay. this is dejecting as rockstar games has failed to optimise this game for android devices. it is recommended that they make necessary improvements and make the game playable for medium to high end devices. i have 4gb internal storage out of 16gb free yet the game lags, even on low settings like 0% resolution and draw distance .

This game is so old school and gta 5 is so much better than this game but it is still worth playing. It has a lot of cheats and hacks but it is still very good. It plays up very x1000000 rare. This game is very fun and if you have seen my comment please download this game immediately because it's extremely fun and it is very easy to collect money ps its okay to play offline and if you have seen my comment i recommend you to download this game immediately and have a great time

I loved this game wh3n I was young and this brings back the best memories of my child hood haha.. the controls are kinda lumpy when steering a vehicle. But all other movements are pretty good. Butt,if you happen to have a Xbox one s controller it works perfect on my galaxy s8 plus. Thanks for porting this game to android and giving the option to max the graphics out. Looks very good! Loving the portal game feel too haha!

Just started, i am playing with an Xbox One controller and everything works perfect.  The only problem is you are stuck with the original controls and cant change the buttons functions.  I wish i could use the triggers for gas and braking for driving the cars like in GTA's 4 and 5.  Other than that everything is good.  A classic game, that runs smoothly, and is a great time nostalgia trip.   This one works so well that i am definitley buying the other ports as soon as i am done with this one.

Game could be grate Game looks awesome but the controls don't work right. Walking and running is not fluid. It's stop and go. While driving it is very hard to steer while pressing the gas pedal. I have Max Payne and the controls in that are great what happened with GTA San Andreas. Please fix. Also could you make it so I can move the game to my SD Card. I am using a Samsung galaxy tab 4.

Guys help please! i gave the game 5 stars because i like it so much. But there's a probleme that im facing now when changed devices i had all my data saved on a samsung alpha device, now i reinstalled the game on my new samsung s6 edge and i loged in, and there was no cloud save. Please help me find a way to fix this! Thank you
description: Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers.Now, it’s the early 90’s. Carl’s got to go home. His mother has been murdered, his family has fallen apart and his childhood friends are all heading towards disaster.On his return to the neighborhood, a couple of corrupt cops frame him for homicide. CJ is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.Rockstar Games brings its biggest release to mobile yet with a vast open-world covering the state of San Andreas and its three major cities – Los Santos, San Fierro and Las Venturas – with enhanced visual fidelity and over 70 hours of gameplay.Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas features:  • Remastered, high-resolution graphics built specifically for mobile including lighting enhancements, an enriched color palette and improved character models. • Cloud save support for playing across all your mobile devices for Rockstar Social Club Members.• Dual analog stick controls for full camera and movement control.• Three different control schemes and customizable controls with contextual options to display buttons only when you need them.• Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controllers and select Bluetooth and USB gamepads.• Integrated with Immersion tactile effects.  • Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings. Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian and Japanese. For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. For information about supported devices and compatibility, please see:http://support.rockstargames.com/hc/en-us/sections/200251868-San-Andreas-Mobile-SupportMobile Version developed by War Drum Studioswww.wardrumstudios.comFind out more:www.rockstargames.comSee videos:www.youtube.com/rockstargamesFollow us:www.facebook.com/rockstargameswww.twitter.com/rockstargames
descriptionHTML:
Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers.

Now, it’s the early 90’s. Carl’s got to go home. His mother has been murdered, his family has fallen apart and his childhood friends are all heading towards disaster.

On his return to the neighborhood, a couple of corrupt cops frame him for homicide. CJ is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.

Rockstar Games brings its biggest release to mobile yet with a vast open-world covering the state of San Andreas and its three major cities – Los Santos, San Fierro and Las Venturas – with enhanced visual fidelity and over 70 hours of gameplay.

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas features:
• Remastered, high-resolution graphics built specifically for mobile including lighting enhancements, an enriched color palette and improved character models.
• Cloud save support for playing across all your mobile devices for Rockstar Social Club Members.
• Dual analog stick controls for full camera and movement control.
• Three different control schemes and customizable controls with contextual options to display buttons only when you need them.
• Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controllers and select Bluetooth and USB gamepads.
• Integrated with Immersion tactile effects. 
• Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings.

Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian and Japanese.

For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.

For information about supported devices and compatibility, please see:
http://support.rockstargames.com/hc/en-us/sections/200251868-San-Andreas-Mobile-Support

description: Collect and upgrade over 100 cards starring your favourite players and compete head-to-head in real-time football matches located in iconic, city based Arenas across the world. Show off your finishing skills by curling one in the top corner, or smashing it past the goalkeeper from distance. Be the last line of defence by taking control of your keeper, tip one over the bar, or make an acrobatic save for the cameras.Win trophies to unlock new levels, gaining access to different Arenas and more elite players with unique special abilities. Compete in tournaments to win prizes, challenge to be the last team standing and prove you are the true Football Clash champion.Form a League with friends or others from across the globe, share XP and help improve each other's players whilst leading your team to victory! KEY FEATURES:* Collect 5 types of player cards - Good, Superb, Elite, Legacy and Legendary.* Each player card has its own set of attributes and one special ability.* Select your ultimate All Star team to defeat your rivals.* Create your strategy by selecting one of the 6 different formations.* Immerse yourself in the action with a 3D dynamic shooting and goalkeeping experience.* Outscore your opponent and take your team to glory.* Win card packs to unlock rewards, build and upgrade your squad with your favourite players.* Tour the world in iconic city Arenas on your path to be No.1* Form a League to donate cards and build your own football community.* Challenge your League members to friendly matches to determine who is best.* Compete in knockout tournaments to determine the ultimate Football Clash champion. comments: While the overall gameplay is pretty good. The whole game is literally a grind fest. Keep playing the same level over and over until you can upgrade, play another level, then proceed to keep playing the same level again. The competitive mode is also messed up as the opponent gets scores near impossible

Everything is great and good but only have one problem. And this problem will killing you all. That's the loading is damn slow no matter you are in LTE network or wifi situation. Because of slow loading it will kill your battery life fast as well. Please help to fix the problem and I will re-rate again. Thanks

Even with a perfect LTE speed game struggled with downloading hunts. The game forces you to do certain hunts before you can go back to the ones you like and want to finish. Not too mention every other minute it forces you to watch an ad or tries to get you to buy something from them. I will be deleting this app once i finish posting this comment.

Awsome game, the only thing wrong with it is that it takes forever to load. The graphics are amazing and so is the gameplay. This is something that could keep me entertained all day and I wouldn't get bored.😺👌

The game currently wont open, when it does its constantly crashing and force stopping. I have the silver subscription ($1.00/weekly) and im unable to take advantage of the content im paying for  want a refund. The upgrades and new equipment are too expensive, the gear and parts are also too expensive and hard to come by especially for the spearfishing which is the best part of the game.. You certainly can't get very far without spending some real money. You can be killed by animals when the come from behind so you with your limited turning capability you have no chance to defend yourself. A lot of problems.
During cts theres moments get sudden lag and it throws off the shooting causing to miss when i know aiming right. It never had these lag bits before.

description: Rings of Anarchy is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG mobile game. In this game, players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses and more in order to collect 27 powerful rings and save the world! Featuring many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, including Emperors and civilians, masters and apprentices, guilds and teams. Plus a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day long. [Game Features]——New Era, offline auto-combatUnique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses when you are busy, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.——Advancement, exclusive customization systemFeaturing a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. Acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks. ——Cool mounts, customizable looksDozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service. Customizable equipment and looks will make you stand out of the crowd. ——Trade freely, buy or sell equipmentIn the market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted.
descriptionHTML:
Rings of Anarchy is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG mobile game. In this game, players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses and more in order to collect 27 powerful rings and save the world! Featuring many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, including Emperors and civilians, masters and apprentices, guilds and teams. Plus a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day long.


[Game Features]

——New Era, offline auto-combat
Unique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses when you are busy, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.

——Advancement, exclusive customization system
Featuring a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. Acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks.

——Cool mounts, customizable looks
Dozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service. Customizable equipment and looks will make you stand out of the crowd.

——Trade freely, buy or sell equipment
In the market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted.

description: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Real strategy and tactics!● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes. ● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!Note: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. descriptionHTML:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.

Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!

Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces!
Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!

Features:
● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes.
● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!
● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!
● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!

Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!

Note:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game

Big updates coming! Stay tuned!

title: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash

comments: Collecting heroes and making your own team is super fun. I wish I could get into the story a bit more, but there are a ton of spelling and grammar errors in the cut scenes that make it difficult to remain engaged. It would be nice if the writing matched the excellent quality of artwork on the game.

I dont ever write reviews for games but this game is so fun, if you like games where you collect level and awaken units like in other similar games you will love This, if you are busy they do have an auto   play function that even collect rewards and starts the next level for you which makes grinding less daunting. The graphics are amazing no flaws there and as a new player right now the newcomer rewards are so helpful.

Customer service is a joke. The game is pretty simple to play, once you get the hang of it. But don't join the game until they bring out a new server, impossible to complete with long time playing players unless you're willing to spend a hell of a lot of money to catch up. Current two servers I play on are pretty dead due to this.
It's been more than a year and com2us haven't fixed the boss raid glitches: disconnections and boss doesn't take damages. Though they will have new costumes and useless mons coming out regularly.

comments: Sorry to say, but in terms of balance it is the worst game I have played so far. This game is the most unbalanced game, even for beginners. Currently I have 4 heroes and the funny part is that all four are weak against defense, such as a cannon, a rail gun, 2 stars for the full upgrade. Even high level players can attack on beginners. Defence is too much high for the attacking players, against 2 heros unit and I've noticed that lower level players can not overcome my defence while high-level players pass easily. This game is good and entertaining, there is not much flaw in this game, but this game is very unbalanced and unfair. Many players have complained about this.
Insane build times make it pretty pointless to play. Log on once a day, start another 3 day build.... boring.

description: Hold onto your helmets - the award-winning Fieldrunners series returns! From exploding Popcorn Chicken to the mighty Megabot, it’s time to assemble the ultimate army as you fight to build your empire, and conquer rival players from around the world!Recruit heroes, train troops, add defensive structures and manage resources to transform a quaint town into your own impenetrable fortress of mayhem. comments: I loved the game up until the date of this review. Too many new customizations require leaf tickets. Which translate into micro-transactions. I was able to get everything in the game without spending money up until now. Now I have spend money in order to get the more interesting content. Sadly, this app will be deleted. I am not giving Nintendo even more of my money, it is not a real Animal Crossing game to waste money on.

I love playing this game, but now I can't get into the game, all I get is support error 802-9016. Don't try and tell me to move closer to the WiFi source, because I put my phone on the WiFi router and got the same thing. My wife, who is sitting next to me, gets into the game just fine. I uninstalled that game, same thing... I would love to get back into this game, and will change my first reassuring back to a 5, but until then... Yeah... Please help....

First-time reviewer and life-long Animal Crossing player. This game combines everything good about the game series like fishing, but catching, gardening, decorating, and more. Therea is always an event going on to keep me playing multiple times a day. The team behind this game actually listen to what people say and fix it and add ease of play features! People saying this is pay to play are full of it. I have well over 600 leaf tickets from just playing the game... you just have to put in the time and complete challenges.

I love the happy music and the relaxed vibe I get while playing this game. Easy enough for young children to learn to play, but not so infantile that an adult can't enjoy it instead. The garbled chipmunk-speak language of the animal friends is hilarious! Level progression seems fair and regular. Pay-to-play options are not necessary to have a good game experience.

I would give this 5/5 across the board, as I have been playing since the November release and enjoyed every moment. Every update has made the game better, as the team listens and integrates whatever they can to make it better.  Microtransactions are ignorable, and they give leaf tickets hand over fist, besides the customizables for the campsite (foreground, midground, background) which are expensive.  Hopefully future updates brings better options.

Just like the actual Animal Crossing games, but with even MORE to do! The only difference is you're a camp owner instead of a town mayor. Oh, and the fact that's it's a FREE app!   Seriously, this is a real deal AC game all squeezed into a free app. It's perfection all around if you like games like AC. They did such an amazing job on it.
description: Get back to nature in Animal Crossing™: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty—it’s up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite- Help Animals As You Explore!While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started—and when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!- Craft Furniture and AmenitiesThe craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals’ requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.- Your Campsite. Your Way.The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.Your campsite can be anything you like—from a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!- Host Animals at Your CampsiteAs you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you’ll be able to host them whenever you like—even if you change up your decorations completely!Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.Cellular data charges may apply.
descriptionHTML:
Get back to nature in Animal Crossing™: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!

You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty—it’s up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.

Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite
- Help Animals As You Explore!
While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started—and when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!

- Craft Furniture and Amenities
The craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals’ requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.

Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.

- Your Campsite. Your Way.
The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.

Your campsite can be anything you like—from a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!

You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!

- Host Animals at Your Campsite
As you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you’ll be able to host them whenever you like—even if you change up your decorations completely!

Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.

Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.
Cellular data charges may apply.

title: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp

comments: Not really an action game app. If you like Mafia Wars than this is perfect for you.   UPDATE: Downtown Wars is by far not a bad game. The question is it a game for you. The animation is very limited so if you enjoy action then this is not a game for you. The best way to describe what I noticed after playing game for nearly a week, that it is a long level up game of tag. The comment board is one of the best aspects because you can communicate with the community most important you gang/mob members which helps for team building.

Very interesting and a nice game to pass time, love the BGM! Really like the changeable tags, it's so convenient to change it according to our mood/status and the profile erase option without losing the mob WOW! A really big thumps up to that! It also kinda reminds me of Mob Wars and Extreme Mob Wars etc which got me feeling nostalgic because I was really into it but, DTM tops it all! ;) Forgot to mention this, we can put space in our name! That's so convenient! Cool!

I think Elites should be boosted atleast 100 Points - 20 billion then 1000 Points - 40 Billion is 10x the work for 2x the reward.  A huge change could be game breaking but raising it to 80 Billion would give new players a chance against older players that give their minis huge collects every tourney.

Very good game but it could be better. Like when uv got multiple invites u should be able to accept them all in one instead of one at a time. But that's my only gripe. Apart from that it's a brilliant game much better than the dead imobsters. 1 more thing where can we find the boss iron fist who's attacked me a couple of times but I can't find him to attack him back. How can you recover ur account when uv forgot Google account details.

For me with all the rejuvenation down time, I get bored. But when the favors work,  it becomes a really fun game to keep your mind busy.  But by having multiple games like this it's Kool to toggle  between them. The graphics are great.   My Love for this game comes from the interactive game plot. You have to build networks with fellow gamers to rank.  And likewise building enemies.

Great game. I have played this game for years. It just continues to get better.  Recently in last 24 hours my phone crashed and I got it back up and running. But only when I open this game. Does it say UNABLE TO REACH SERVER. I don't know what's wrong. It won't let me open game at all. Plz fix for me

description: كن حر واختار مصيرك في مدينة الاوغاد، والمكان الذي يمكن أن تصبح مليونير العالم، زعيم مافيا أو أي شيء كنت تريد أن تكون! مدينة الاوغاد لعبة مافيا جريمة متعددة على الانترنت.توحيد ونمو عائلتك إلى إمبراطورية فى الجريمة على مستوى عالمي. تصل إلى الصالة الرياضية، تنهش في الشوارع، وقهر عواصم العالم، وتسلق طريقك إلى الأعلى  كملك الجريمة في نهاية المطاف. هل لديك ما يلزم؟ ترك الأخلاق عند الباب،  اسحب البنادق و ابدأ العملأو الذهاب وخلق الامبراطورية المالية الخاصة بك! السفر في جميع أنحاء العالم: شراء وبيع وخصائص التجارة، والتخصصات، والأسلحة والدروع والمعدات! ابدأ العمل والعمل طريقك إلى الأعلىمزايا مدينة الاوغاد: اللعب الحر على الانترنت مع الاف من اللاعبينحارب, اسرق, و اضرب لاعبين اخرين عن طريق الانترنتاغمل ثروة عن طريق استثمار نقودك فى الممتلكات, العمل, و التجارة.انشاء عائلة مع الاصدقاء و العمل معا للحصول على الاحترامبناء العضلات وتحسين أسلحتك والدروع لهزيمة أعدائكدردشة، تكوين صداقات جديدة، وهزيمة أعدائك وتلبية الحب في حياتكتنغمس في السلوك الإجرامي لتوسيع الإمبراطورية الخاصة بكالاستمتاع بالانشطة العالمية المثيرة ملاحظة:هذه لعبة على الانترنت فقط, لذلك يجب ان تكون متصلا بالانترنت للعب

comments: I really love this game, you get rewarded for prioritizing property and it's very satisfying to finish the level with a perfect score when you time everything just right. The diamonds are a little bit too rare to get and since half the updates are priced with diamonds the end result is each location doesn't get 100% upgraded, witch is a little bit frustrating. I love that when you revisit a level it's slightly different, makes it much more interesting. It's a lovely little game, kudos to the developers and designers!

1. This should have an UNLIMITED LIVES option. The stages per level are unenjoyably difficult enough --why do you have to limit the player's chance to try and be better?? Some levels are impossible for human fingers already.  2. You should lessen the required number of diamonds as value of items to upgrade!!! A player only gets 9 diamonds per level achieved. 10 gems per upgrade is ok, but 50??? FIX THIS ASAP or people will be deleting this app.

I love it cuz it's the best but some of the costumers are feisty. The old lady takes three the man and boy takes two things. The young lady is fine. She takes 1 stuff. The little girl I hate her. She rides her scooter in the shop when she know full well she post to ride her scooter outside. But everything else is okay.

I always love supermarket mania. I played supermarket mania 1 and 2 and expect great things for this. But, no, this game infuriates me. The pace is really slow and the customer stream is to long. More over, it use diamonds for essential upgrades like cashier (why should i upgrade cashier??) and cart. Grinding diamonds is a pain in the ass. I think the developer only think of making money than make this game enjoyable to it's player.

I like this game but it needs to give better options earn Crystal's and it should not cost you as many if any at all to move to next level. I play a lot of games and don't mind spending a few dollars but now I'm turned off from it. Yall need to do better. I Won't suggest it to any of my friends for that reason alone.

I really have fun with this game. I also like how you can earn the crystals through playing, not absolutely having to pay. One thing that would be nice was to have the option to fast forward especially with times when you're just waiting for customers or the elderly ladies to finish shopping. Also an endless challenging round would be awesome. Thanks =)
description: Running a grocery chain can be a lot of fun! Dive into this highly addictive time management game based on our bestselling Supermarket Mania franchise – and prepare to stay on your toes every single second. Join millions of players who are already fans of Nikki! Head to Tinseltown with Nikki and her friends to help the Mayor strengthen the city’s economic development. Roll up your sleeves, open new supermarkets and help Nikki keep them stocked to the rafters. Manage 14 unique stores through 340 challenging yet amusing levels, serve ten types of choosy customers and upgrade your shelves and freezers so that they can hold more inventory. Tackle numerous quests to earn achievements and rewards and grow your enterprise into a wild success. Just remember – keep an eye on Mr. Torg’s dirty tricks!While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.● Nearly 340 levels through 14 game settings to play● 10 uniquely demanding customers to please● 85 products to sell with savvy and great service● Nearly 315 upgrades to spruce up your stores● Regular FREE updates to keep you stimulated and entertained● Google Play game services support ______________________________ COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.______________________________ VISIT US: http://www.g5e.comWATCH US: http://www.youtube.com/g5enterFOLLOW US: http://www.twitter.com/g5gamesGAME FAQS: http://www.g5e.com/support_androidTerms of Service: http://www.g5e.com/termsofserviceG5 End User License Supplemental Terms: http://www.g5e.com/G5_End_User_License_Supplemental_Terms

comments: Enjoyed the game. Very fun and im actually spending which is rare for me.   I dont like the orb prices go up with each new arena. I wont be spending now im in in arena 4 those prices are just not worth it. Id also like the ability to save a few different decks. And make gold earning a bit easier its not balanced. Im in arena 4 and been saving gold for over a week not spending on anything opening orbs. And i still cant upgrade any of my cards.   Tbh as much as i enjoy the game. If i cant upgrade without spendig then ill wind up uninstalling eventually

Love it! Very interesting and fun to play, but i have a suggestion. You should add some spells (Poison, Heal...). They don't have to be overpowered, just for slightly more fun gameplay! Also they should be regular cards (Heroes). And one more thing: bring some advatage to players that don't start first in the match, because it's easier to win when you are playing first.

Very unique and fun strategy game. Easy to understand from the first game. Very forgiving to newcomers but if you want to get good, it takes planning and learning. Fun to pick up and play throughout the day. My only problem is that if you sit and play for more than a few minutes, you'll waste alot of orbs winning games. You can spend gems to free up slots, but I'd rather just not receive orbs until I have a free slot. Good game.

I wish that your global rank was more intuitive and less complicated to acquire. Also on the achievement's it says that I can't get the last 2 stars on the found heroes however I have all that I can get. I also wish there was a pm option as the leader of a clan I want to give constructive criticism but not call them out in the chat.. other than that it fully deserved the 5 star.. thanks for makeing this and keep smashing!!😋

The game itself its good, but lack of fun. To upgrade cards you need money which is hard to get in the game and from the clan. In free chest and common orbs you never get any rare cards and money is too less. Would be fun if the cards could be developed faster and if they would have a counter attack possibility when you upgrade it to certain level. You could implement a coop when each plyer choose 2 cards from deck or something similar. In addition I would change which player starts, should be based on the deck strenght. I would also implement the position of the cards on the field and which card is in front and which card in the back, by that you need to start a bit more strategic. Hope that something happens with the gameplay soon, before more players leave. Good luck

Love the game. Really fun to play and balanced so even non paying players can do well. One complaint I have is the new addition of zombie has a bug, when hitting a buffed opponent the poison touch doesnt replace the buff. Please fix this issue.

Build your fearless Smashing Four squad and fight your way to the top!
